summary.span: 表示可用于呈现一组项的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 可包含多个项的类型，如字符串、对象或其他元素。An is a type of that can contain multiple items, such as strings, objects, or other elements. 下图显示了一个 控件，该控件包含以下不同类型的项：The following illustration shows a control that contains the following different types of items: - 一个字符串。A string. - 对象。A object. - 对象。A object. - 一个 包含 和的控件 。A control that contains an and a . ![具有四种类型内容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "具有四种类型内容的 ListBox")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 包含多种类型对象的 ListBoxListBox that contains multiple types of objects 使用 或 属性来指定要用于生成的内容的集合 。Use either the or the property to specify the collection to use to generate the content of your . 可以将属性设置 为任何实现的类型 。You can set the property to any type that implements . 通常用于显示数据集合或将绑定 到集合对象。 is typically used to display a data collection or to bind an to a collection object. 如果你不希望使用实现 的对象来填充 ，则可以通过使用属性添加项 。If you do not want to use an object that implements to populate the , you can add items by using the property. 中的项 可以具有不同的类型。The items in an can have different types. 例如， 可以包含一个作为字符串的项以及另一个为的项 。For example, a can contain one item that is a string and another item that is an . 如果 设置了属性，则 集合设置为只读且固定大小。When the property is set, the collection is set to read-only and fixed-size. 这意味着不能直接向集合中添加项。This means that you cannot add items to the collection directly. 使用时，将属性设置为可 `null` 删除集合，并将使用情况还原为 空 。When is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to , which will be an empty . 每个 类型都有一个对应的项容器类型。Each type has a corresponding item container type. 每个的对应项容器都 追加 `Item` 到其名称。The corresponding item container for each appends `Item` to its name. 例如，对于 ，项容器是 控件; 对于 ，它们是 控件。For example, for , the item containers are controls; for , they are controls. 可以为中的每个项显式创建容器类型 ，但这并不是必需的。You can explicitly create a container type for each item in the , but it is not necessary. 如果未显式创建容器类型，则会生成一个包含项集合中的数据项的。When you do not explicitly create the container type, one is generated that contains a data item in the item collection. 例如，如果将字符串对象的集合绑定到的 属性 ，则不会显式创建 对象，但 将为每个字符串生成一个对象。For example, if you bind a collection of string objects to the property of a , you do not explicitly create objects, but the will generate one for each string. 可以通过使用属性访问生成的项容器 。You can access a generated item container by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 当包含重复对象时，UI 自动化的某些功能无法正常工作 。Certain features of UI Automation do not work correctly when an contains duplicate objects. 如果对象多次出现，则只有第一个实例出现在自动化树中。If an object appears multiple times, only the first instance appears in the automation tree. 如果返回，则将 (两个对象 **x** 和 **y** 视为重复 `Object.Equals(x, y)` `true` 。 ) (Two objects **x** and **y** are considered to be duplicates if `Object.Equals(x, y)` returns `true`.) > > 当对象 **x** 由 x 返回的值使用时 **。**`GetHashCode()`While an object **x** is in use by an the value returned by **x.**`GetHashCode()` 不得更改。must not change. 对此值所做的更改不受支持，导致不可预知的行为。Changes to this value are unsupported, and lead to unpredictable behavior. 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将数据绑定到 。The following examples demonstrate binding data to an . 第一个示例创建一个名 `MyData` 为的类，该类是一个简单的字符串集合。The first example creates a class called `MyData` that is a simple string collection. [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#8)] 下面的示例将的 对象绑定 到 `MyData` 。The following example binds the object of an to `MyData`. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#7)] [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#6)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#9)] 下图显示了 在上一个示例中创建的控件。The following illustration shows the control created in the previous example. ![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox")![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox") 下面的示例演示如何 使用 属性填充。The following example demonstrates how to populate an by using the property. 该示例将以下不同类型的项添加到中 ：The example adds the following different types of items to the : - 一个字符串。A string. - 对象。A object. - 对象。A object. - 一个 包含其他对象的控件 。A control that contains other objects. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)] 下图显示了 在上一个示例中创建的。The following illustration shows the created in the previous example. ![具有四种类型内容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "具有四种类型内容的 ListBox")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 下面的示例演示如何使用提供的不同样式和与模板相关的属性 。The following example illustrates how to use the different styling and templating-related properties that are provided by the . 在此示例中，绑定到对象的集合 `Task` 。The in this example is bound to a collection of `Task` objects. 为便于演示，本示例中的样式和模板都进行了内联声明。For demonstration purposes, the styles and templates in this example are all declared inline. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#ItemsControlProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemscontrolproperties)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following illustration is a screenshot of the example when it is rendered. ![ItemsControl 示例屏幕快照](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl 示例屏幕快照")![ItemsControl example screenshot](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl example screenshot") 此处未显示的的两个其他样式相关的属性 为 和 。Two other style-related properties of the that are not shown here are and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 属性可以指定两个或多个交替项容器的外观。The and properties enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating item containers. 例如，您可以为中的每个第三项指定交替的背景色 。For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third item in an . 将 分配给中的每个项容器 。The is assigned to each item container in the . 从0开始，增量为 减1，然后重启到0。 begins at 0, increments until it is minus 1, and then restarts at 0. 例如，如果 为3，并且中有七个项 ，则下表列出了 每个项的。For example, if is 3 and there are seven items in the , the following table lists the for each item. |项在中的位置 Position of Item in the || |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |11|00| |22|11| |33|22| |44|00| |55|11| |66|22| |77|00| 您可以使用几种方法为交替项容器指定不同的外观。There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating item containers. 一种方法是将 items 容器的属性绑定到 。One method is to bind properties of the items container to the . 然后，可以使用 来指定应将哪个值应用于具有特定值的项容器 。You can then use an to specify which value should be applied to the item container that has a certain value. 你还可以使用触发器来更改项容器的属性的值，具体取决于它的值 。You can also use triggers to change the value of an item container's property depending on the value of its . ## Examples 下面的示例指定 从) 继承的 ( 具有 (类型的交替项容器 ，并为每个) 类型指定不同的背景和前景。The following example specifies that the (which inherits from ) has alternating item containers (which are of type ) and specifies a different background and foreground for each one. 该示例将 和 属性绑定到， 并 为每个属性提供。The example binds the and properties to the and provides an for each property. [!code-xaml[AlternationIndexSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AlternationIndexSnippets/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] 下面的示例通过使用对象来实现与前面的示例相同的 。The following example does the same as the previous example by using objects. summary.span: 获取或设置源对象上的值的路径，以用作对象的可视表示形式。

span.span: Gets or sets a path to a value on the source object to serve as the visual representation of the object.

value.span: 源对象上的值的路径。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是定义描述如何显示数据对象的默认模板的一种简单方法。This property is a simple way to define a default template that describes how to display the data objects. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 在下面的示例中，名为的静态资源 `places` 定义为对象的 `Place` 集合，其中每个 `Place` 对象都有一个 `CityName` 属性和一个 `State` 属性。In the following example, the static resource named `places` is defined as a collection of `Place` objects, in which each `Place` object has a `CityName` property and a `State` property. 前缀 `src` 映射到定义数据源的命名空间 `Places` 。The prefix `src` is mapped to the namespace where the data source `Places` is defined. 前缀 `scm` 和 `dat` 分别映射到 和 命名空间。The prefixes `scm` and `dat` are mapped to the and namespaces, respectively. 下面的示例创建数据集合的视图，该视图按 city 名称进行排序并按状态分组。The following example creates a view of the data collection that is sorted by the city name and grouped by the state. [!code-xaml[CollectionViewSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CollectionViewSource/CS/window1.xaml#1)] 视图可以是绑定源，如以下示例中所示。The view can be a binding source, as in the following example. 由于指定的 ，每个 `Place` 对象都显示为其 `CityName` 值。Because of the specified , each`Place` object is shown with its `CityName` value. 如果 未指定，并且没有，则 将在 此示例中显示基础集合中每个对象的字符串表示形式 ("SDKSample" ) 。If is not specified and there is no , then the displays a string representation of each object in the underlying collection (in this case, "SDKSample.Place"). [!code-xaml[CollectionViewSource#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CollectionViewSource/CS/window1.xaml#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示搜索项时大小写是否为条件。

value.span: 如果文本搜索区分大小写，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if text searches are case-sensitive; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 `true` ， 属性指定是否在中选择了某个项 。When the property is set to `true`, the property specifies whether the case determines whether an item is selected in an . 例如，如果 包含两个仅大小写不同的字符串（如 "item" 和 "item"），则将始终选中第一个字符串，而不考虑输入的大小写。For example, if an contain two strings that differ only in case, such as "ITEM" and "item", the first string will always be selected, regardless of the case of the input. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，它包含字符串 "dog"、"cat"、"dog" 和 "cat"。The following example creates a that contains the strings, "DOG", "CAT", "dog", and "cat". 该示例将 属性绑定到的 属性 。The example binds the property to the property of a . 如果选中此复选框，并且用户键入 "dog"，则将选择中的第三项 。If the check box is selected and the user types "dog", the third item in the is selected. 如果用户取消选中此复选框并键入 "dog"，则将选择第一项，因为大小写不是搜索条件。If the user unselects the check box and types "dog", the first item is selected because case is not a condition of the search. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性时，每个项容器将获取一个， 它具有与相同的 对象 ，但描述绑定中的数据的属性（如 和 ）特定于中每个项的数据 。When you set the property, each item container gets a that has the same objects as the , but the properties that describe the data in the bindings, such as and , are specific to the data for each item in the . 您必须访问项容器的 以执行诸如验证数据和检查项的错误等操作。You must access the item container's to perform operations such as validate the data and check for errors on an item. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个应用程序的一部分，该应用程序提示用户输入多个客户，并为每个客户分配一个销售代表，然后检查销售代表和客户是否属于同一区域。The following example is part of an application that prompts the user to enter multiple customers and assign a sales representative to each customer, and then checks that the sales representative and the customer belong to the same region. 该示例设置的 ，因此， `AreasMatch` 将验证每个项。The example sets the of the so the , `AreasMatch`, will validate each item. 该示例还创建了一个 显示验证错误的。The example also creates a that displays validation errors. 请注意，的将 绑定到 它从属性获取的 。Notice that the of the is bound to a that it gets from the property. 的值 是具有错误的项容器。The value of is the item container that has the error. [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#ItemBindingGroup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window2.xaml#itembindinggroup)] [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidationAdornerSiteFor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window2.xaml#validationadornersitefor)] 下面的示例获取项容器，并对 容器调用 以验证数据。The following example gets the item container and calls on the container's to validate the data. 必须通过对项容器的（而不是）调用方法来验证数据 。You must validate the data by calling a method on the item container's , not on the of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 负责为其主机生成用户界面 (UI) ，例如 。An is responsible for generating the user interface (UI) for its host, such as an . 它保留控件数据视图中项与相应对象之间的关联 。It maintains the association between the items in the data view of the control and the corresponding objects. 每个 都有一个关联的项容器，其中包含项集合中的数据项。Every has an associated item container that contains a data item in the item collection. 您可以使用 属性来访问与您的关联的项容器 。You can use the property to access the item container that is associated with your . 例如，如果您有一个数据绑定控件， 并且您希望 基于其索引或其关联数据项获取，则可以使用 或 方法。For example, if you have a data-bound control and you want to get a based on its index or its associated data item, you can use the or the method. 或者，可以使用 或 方法来获取与给定生成的容器元素关联的索引或数据项。Alternatively, you can use the or the method to get the index or data item that is associated with a given generated container element. 接口还在高级方案中使用。The interface is also used in advanced scenarios. 通常，具有其自己的虚拟化面板实现的高级应用程序会调用接口的成员。Typically, advanced applications that have their own implementation of a virtualizing panel call members of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性或属性可以 设置样式，以影响包含数据项的元素的外观。You use this property or the property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items. 例如，对于 ，生成的容器是 控件; 对于 ，它们是 控件。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. 为视觉对象自定义提供了极大的灵活性，并提供了许多样式设置和模板化属性。The provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties. 若要影响项的布局，请使用 属性。To affect the layout of the items, use the property. 如果对控件使用分组，则可以使用 或 属性。If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the or property. 若要指定数据对象的可视化，请使用 或 属性。To specify the visualization of data objects, use the or property. 有关何时指定的详细信息 ，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview)。For more information about when to specify an , see [Data Templating Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource` 、或 `DynamicResource` 。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 除非样式本身包含对潜在运行时引用（如系统资源或用户首选项）的引用，否则 `StaticResource` 通常建议对样式的引用以提高性能。Unless the styles themselves contain references to potential run-time references such as system resources or user preferences, `StaticResource` reference to a style is usually recommended for performance. *StyleResourceKey**StyleResourceKey* `x:Key` 引用作为资源请求的样式的字符串值。`x:Key` string value referring to the style being requested as a resource. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性。The following example demonstrates how to use this property. 请考虑下面的数据绑定 ：Consider the following data-bound : [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSnippet#UIListBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#uilistbox)] 若要为包含数据项的元素创建样式，请创建 样式，如以下示例中所示。To create a style for the elements that contain the data items, create a style, as shown in the following example. 样式应用于 在其中定义样式的范围内的所有元素。The style is applied to all elements within the scope the style is defined in. [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSnippet#ListBoxItemStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#listboxitemstyle)] 是控件的容器元素 。The is the container element for the control. 因此，上述一种替代方法是将 的属性设置 为定义的样式。Therefore, an alternative to the preceding is to set the property of the to the defined style. 为此，请将样式命名为， `x:Key` 以便它可用作资源：To do that, give the style an `x:Key` so it is available as a resource: [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSample_snippet#ContainerStyle1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSample_snippet/CSharp/Window1.xaml#containerstyle1)] 接下来，将 属性设置为资源，如以下示例中所示：Next, set the property to the resource, as in the following example: [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSample_snippet#ListBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSample_snippet/CSharp/Window1.xaml#listbox)] 上述两个方案都生成相同的结果。Both of the preceding scenarios produce the same result. 不过，使样式作为资源提供的优点之一是可以重复使用样式。However, one of the advantages of making the style available as a resource is that you can reuse the style. 显式设置 属性还能提供更好的可读性。Setting the property explicitly can also provide greater readability. 有关完整示例，请参阅 [样式设置和模板化示例简介](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160010)。For the complete example, see [Introduction to Styling and Templating Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160010). 下面的示例旨在说明由提供的不同样式和模板相关属性的功能 。The following example is designed to illustrate the function of the different styling and templating related properties provided by the . 在此示例中，绑定到对象的集合 `Task` 。The in this example is bound to a collection of `Task` objects. 为便于演示，本示例中的样式和模板都进行了内联声明。For demonstration purposes, the styles and templates in this example are all declared inline. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#ItemsControlProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemscontrolproperties)] 下面是该示例在呈现时的屏幕快照：The following is a screenshot of the example when it is rendered: ![ItemsControl 示例屏幕快照](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl 示例屏幕快照")![ItemsControl example screenshot](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl example screenshot") 此处未显示的的两个其他样式相关的属性 为 和 。Two other style-related properties of the that are not shown here are and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于向添加项 。This property may be used to add items to an . 如果将子对象添加到对象中，则 会将其隐式添加到 对象的。Adding a child to an object implicitly adds it to the for the object. > [!NOTE] > 仅可通过所示的集合语法 (XAML) Extensible Application Markup Language 设置此属性，或者通过访问集合对象并使用它的各种方法（如）来设置此属性 `Add` 。This property can only be set in Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) via the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as `Add`. 用于访问集合对象本身的属性是只读的，并且集合本身是可读写的。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only, and the collection itself is read-write. 请注意，使用 或 属性来指定应用于生成的内容的集合 。Note that you use either the or the property to specify the collection that should be used to generate the content of your . 如果 设置了属性，则 集合将变为只读且固定大小。When the property is set, the collection is made read-only and fixed-size. 使用时，将 属性设置为可 `null` 删除集合，并将使用情况还原为 空 。When is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to , which will be an empty . ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreElements**OneOrMoreElements* 一个或多个 对象。One or more objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将数据绑定到 。The following examples demonstrate binding data to an . 第一个示例创建一个名 `MyData` 为的类，该类是一个简单的字符串集合。The first example creates a class called `MyData` that is a simple string collection. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)] 下图显示了 在上一个示例中创建的。The following illustration shows the created in the previous example. ![具有四种类型内容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "具有四种类型内容的 ListBox")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 请注意， 是一个视图，因此可以使用与视图相关的功能，如排序、筛选和分组。Note that the is a view, so you can use the view-related functionalities such as sorting, filtering, and grouping. 例如，如果你具有的实例 ， `myListBox` 则可以执行以下操作以对的内容进行排序 。For example, if you have an instance of a , `myListBox`, you can do the following to sort the content of the . 在此示例中， `Content` 是要按其排序的属性的名称。In this example, `Content` is the name of the property to sort by. remarks.format: ## Remarks **内容模型：** 此属性可用于向添加项 。**Content Model:** This property may be used to add items to an . 常见的一种情况是使用 、 或 来显示数据集合，或将绑定 到集合对象。A common scenario is to use an such as a , , or to display a data collection, or to bind an to a collection object. 若要将绑定 到集合对象，请使用 属性。To bind an to a collection object, use the property. 请注意， 默认情况下，该属性支持 绑定。Note that the property supports binding by default. 如果 设置了属性，则 集合将变为只读且固定大小。When the property is set, the collection is made read-only and fixed-size. 使用时，将属性设置为可 `null` 删除集合，并将使用情况还原为 空 。When is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to , which will be an empty . 当未 使用时，此属性的值为 `null` ，并且将其设置为 `null` 不起作用。When is not in use, the value of this property is `null`, and setting it to `null` has no effect. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，不需要实现自己的集合。In most cases you do not need to implement your own collections. 请考虑使用 或其他现有集合。Instead, consider using or other existing collections. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [绑定源概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview)中的 "用作绑定源的集合对象"。For more information, see the "Collection Objects Used as Binding Source" in [Binding Sources Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *bindingDeclaration**bindingDeclaration* 声明。A declaration. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [绑定标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension) 。See [Binding Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension) for more information. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 指定数据对象的可视化。You use the to specify the visualization of the data objects. 如果 将绑定到集合对象，但未使用提供特定的显示说明 ，则每个项的生成 UI 是基础集合中每个对象的字符串表示形式。If your is bound to a collection object and you do not provide specific display instructions using a , the resulting UI of each item is a string representation of each object in the underlying collection. 在上设置时，将按如下所示 生成 UI () ：When you set an on an , the UI is generated as follows (using the as an example): 1. 在内容生成过程中，将 启动一个请求，以便为 每个数据项创建容器。During content generation, the initiates a request for the to create a container for each data item. 对于 ，容器为 。For , the container is a . 生成器将回调到 以准备容器。The generator calls back into the to prepare the container. 2. 部分准备工作涉及将的复制到的 。Part of the preparation involves the copying of the of the to be the of the . 3. 与所有类型类似，的是 包含 。Similar to all types, the of a contains a . 当应用该模板时，它将创建一个， 其 绑定到的 。When the template is applied, it creates a whose is bound to the of the . 4. 最后，将其 应用于 自身，并创建 UI。Finally, the applies that to itself, and that creates the UI. 如果定义了多个， 并且想要提供逻辑来以编程方式选择和应用 ，请使用 属性。If you have more than one defined and you want to supply logic to programmatically choose and apply a , use the property. 为视觉对象自定义提供了极大的灵活性，并提供了许多样式设置和模板化属性。The provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties. 使用 属性或 属性设置样式，以影响包含数据项的元素的外观。Use the property or the property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items. 例如，对于 ，生成的容器是 控件; 对于 ，它们是 控件。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. 若要影响项的布局，请使用 属性。To affect the layout of the items, use the property. 如果对控件使用分组，则可以使用 或 属性。If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the or property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： [StaticResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension)或 [DynamicResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension)。One of the following: [StaticResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension), or [DynamicResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension). 除非样式本身包含对潜在运行时引用（如系统资源或用户首选项）的引用，否则，通常建议使用样式的 [StaticResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension) 引用来提高性能。Unless the styles themselves contain references to potential run-time references such as system resources or user preferences, [StaticResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension) reference to a style is usually recommended for performance. *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 用于引用作为资源请求的模板的[X：Key 指令](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive)字符串值。[x:Key Directive](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive) string value referring to the template being requested as a resource. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 内联。The following example shows how to create a inline. 指定每个数据项在中显示为三个 元素 。The specifies that each data item appears as three elements within a . 在此示例中，数据对象是一个名为的类 `Task` 。In this example, the data object is a class called `Task`. 请注意， 此模板中的每个元素都绑定到类的属性 `Task` 。Note that each element in this template is bound to a property of the `Task` class. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#Inline](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#inline)] 更常见 的是在 resources 节中定义，因此它可以是可重复使用的对象，如以下示例中所示：It is more common to define a in the resources section so it can be a reusable object, as in the following example: [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r1)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#AsResource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#asresource)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r2)] 现在可以将 `myTaskTemplate` 用作资源，如以下示例所示：Now you can use `myTaskTemplate` as a resource, as in the following example: [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#MyTaskTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#mytasktemplate)] 有关完整示例，请参阅[数据模板化示例简介](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160009)。For the complete sample, see [Introduction to Data Templating Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160009).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 指定数据对象的可视化。You use the to specify the visualization of the data objects. 如果定义了多个模板，并且想要提供逻辑来返回要使用的模板，则使用此属性。If you have more than one template defined and want to supply logic to return a template to use, then you use this property. 请注意，如果设置了，则忽略此属性 。Note that this property is ignored if is set. 为视觉对象自定义提供了极大的灵活性，并提供了许多样式设置和模板化属性。The provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties. 使用 属性或 属性设置样式，以影响包含数据项的元素的外观。Use the property or the property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items. 例如，对于 ，生成的容器是 控件; 对于 ，它们是 控件。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. 若要影响项的布局，请使用 属性。To affect the layout of the items, use the property. 如果对控件使用分组，则可以使用 或 属性。If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the or property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource` 、或 `DynamicResource` 。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 除非样式本身包含对潜在运行时引用（如系统资源或用户首选项）的引用，否则 `StaticResource` 通常建议对样式的引用以提高性能。Unless the styles themselves contain references to potential run-time references such as system resources or user preferences, `StaticResource` reference to a style is usually recommended for performance. *SelectorResourceKey**SelectorResourceKey* `x:Key` 引用作为资源请求的选择器的字符串值。`x:Key` string value referring to the selector being requested as a resource. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 在下面的示例中， `auctionItemDataTemplateSelector` 资源名称 (对应于 `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` 类) 分配给的 属性 。In the following example, the `auctionItemDataTemplateSelector` resource name (corresponding to an `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` class) is assigned to the property of the . [!code-xaml[DataTemplateSelector#ItemTemplateSelector](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemtemplateselector)] 下面的示例演示如何 `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` 通过重写方法来实现类 ：The following example shows the implementation of the `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` class with an override of the method: [!code-csharp[DataTemplateSelector#DataTemplateSelector](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplateSelector/CSharp/AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector.cs#datatemplateselector)] [!code-vb[DataTemplateSelector#DataTemplateSelector](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplateSelector/visualbasic/auctionitemdatatemplateselector.vb#datatemplateselector)] 在这种情况下，在 类的方法中，有一个逻辑，根据 `SpecialFeatures` 传递的对象的属性值返回相应的模板 `item` 。In this case, within the method of the class, there is logic to return the appropriate template based on the value of the `SpecialFeatures` property of the `item` object passed. 在封装元素的资源中找到要返回的模板 。The template to return is found in the resources of the enveloping element. 设置 属性时，将定向到，以便 `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` 为绑定到的集合中的每个项自动调用的方法 。When you set the property, the is directed to automatically call the method of `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` for each of the items in the collection to which the is bound. 调用以对象的形式传递数据项。The call passes the data item as an object. 然后，将 使用方法返回的来显示该数据项。The that is returned by the method is then used to display that data item. 有关其他示例，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview)。For another example, see [Data Templating Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview).
